data.text:
BTC is indeed a fork of the original bitcoin protocol, a fork to which @Dr_CSWright controls database rights.

The BTC Maxi position is they'll evade US and UK sanctions against their fork should it ever come to that, which is a bad signal for an asset deemed a "store-of-value." https://t.co/6HdsltCCy9 https://t.co/m7ETfoDMIn

tweets.text: Jamie Dimon: crypto tokens are "decentralized Ponzi schemes" https://t.co/HSVcL88ZY4 https://t.co/zJqLtfBkMI

urls.title: Dimon Says Crypto Tokens Are ‘Decentralized Ponzi Schemes’
urls.description: Jamie Dimon didn’ t mince words when a US lawmaker mentioned the executive’s history of criticizing cryptocurrencies. “I’ m a major skeptic on crypto tokens, which you call currency, like Bitcoin,” the JPMorgan Chase & Co. chief executive officer said in congressional testimony Wednesday. “They are decentralized Ponzi schemes.”
